metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3731 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: LedgerSMB does not sufficiently guard against being wrapped by other sites, making it vulnerable to 'clickjacking'. This allows an attacker to trick a targetted user to execute unintended actions.

criterions.comment: ledgersmb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
